page.title: 07WHITTONSTALL SCHOOL EVENTS
page.content: WHITTONSTALL SCHOOL HAS NO FORMAL PARENT-TEACHER ORGANISATION BUT ALL PARENTS ARE ENCOURAGED TO TAKE AN ACTIVE PART IN THE LIFE OF THE SCHOOL.THESE ACTIVITIES OFTEN INVOLVE THE WHOLE VILLAGE AND ADD TO THE COMMUNITY FEELING.MANY OF THE ACTIVITIES RAISE MONEY FOR THE SCHOOL OR CHARITY.THE SCHOOL HOLDS THREE LARGE MONEY RAISING EVENTS EACH YEAR-THE JUMBLE SALE,THE SUPPER DANCE,AND THE GRAND FETE.OTHER SMALLER EVENTS ARE ALSO HELD, -WHICH MAY NOT ALWAYS BE TO MAKE MONEY FOR EXAMPLE MUSICAL EVENINGS,FASHION SHOWS,TREASURE HUNTS,AND THE FAMILY SPORTS EVENGING.AT CHRISTMAS PARTIES ARE HELD,AND THE SCHOOL CILDREN PERFORM THEIR PLAY FOR BOTH THE PARENTS AND OLD PEOPLE.
